body:
where adding multiple specs results in an error that the package was already added

EX:
``` 
spack add amrex%gcc
Adding amrex%gcc to environment
``` 
adds amrex%gcc to the spack.yaml successfully, but trying to add another spec of amrex will fail:

``` 
spack add amrex%intel
Package amrex was already added to ...
```

Change results in multiple specs being added to spack.yaml
title: spack add: allow multiple specs with the same name
